brand.tagline: Wide-format media, finishing films and support for every production floor.
hero.title: More than 25 years of experience in the graphics industry
hero.subtitle: We source premium inkjet, solvent, UV, latex and finishing media so you can deliver unforgettable print work fast.
intro.heading: Professional Printing Solutions
intro.body: Mediahaus supplies high-quality wide-format media, finishing films, and technical support to agencies, PSPs and installers across Southern Africa.

features.0.title: Specialist guidance
features.0.body: Real production advice from operators who have spent decades on press floors.
features.1.title: Stock that performs
features.1.body: Inkjet, solvent, latex and DTF media curated and stress-tested across climates.
features.2.title: Fast fulfilment
features.2.body: Coastal and Gauteng warehousing keeps wraps, films and laminates in reach.
testimonials.heading: What our customers are printing
testimonials.quote: “The Mediahaus team double checked our printer profile and shipped the correct vinyl the same day. It saved the entire promotion.”
cta.heading: Ready to power up your next print run?
cta.body: Send us your material list or a visual brief and we will confirm compatible media, lead times and finishing recommendations.
